welcome_message_title: Welcome to Vila Franca de Xira
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vila Franca de Xira, where you'll find charming streets, historic architecture, and a rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy our beautiful city and all it has to offer.
